Pre-Game Insights: The Cricket Cranes are set for their ICC T20 World Cup debut when they take on Afghanistan on Tuesday morning.
Uganda defeated Zimbabwe in the qualifiers in Namibia and secured the spot in unprecedented fashion.
The Uganda Cricket Association (UCA) has brought in Abhay Sharma and perhaps he is the right man for the team at this point in their development.
The coach is big on processes and situations, something he has tried to instil in this group of players.
Brian Masaba wants the boys to play the match, not the teams.
Victory will belong to the brave.
Miscellaneous Highlights: They got a chance to meet Team Australia where they incidentally shared a hotel within Trinidad and Tobago.
The idea that they will soon play on the same pitches with these stars will probably give them the push they need to believe in the ability that brought them this far.
